cpou_rclone_modal_explanation: Please download a configuration file to connect to Rclone.
cpou_rclone_modal_input_region_label: Select the region to which this file will apply:
cpou_rclone_modal_security_note: For security reasons, the configuration file doesn't include your password so you must add your password manually by editing the configuration file.
cpou_rclone_modal_loading_error: An error occurred while loading the data linked to the rClone file: {{ message }}
